public_description: Choose shoes that is not like others in style
public_instructions:
Look at the images of shoes. 7 out of 8 shoes have the same style. And only one shoe pair has a different style. You have to choose it.
Style means shape and design. But not color. There is no need to look into the details.

Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up markup.

Often all the extra shoes stands out obviously. If this is not the case, choose the one that you think is the most different in style.

Examples

  • All women's shoes are closed, and only one shoe is open - it is intruder 
  • Only one pair of high-rise shoes, and the rest are low 
  • Here all the shoes are demi-season and warm, and the extra pair are light sneakers
